Generation III.Ruby: Swablu has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This Pok é mon is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
Generation III.Sapphire: Swablu loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty, it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings become dirty, this Pok é mon finds a stream and showers itself.
Generation III.Emerald: A Pok é mon that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, Swablu flocks move closer to towns in the spring.
Generation III.FireRed: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

Generation IV.Diamond: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone's head, it looks like a cotton hat.
Generation IV.Pearl: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone's head, it looks like a cotton hat.
Generation IV.Platinum: It can't relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its wings bring cottony clouds to mind. It grooms with springwater and loves to sit on heads.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Its wings bring cottony clouds to mind. It grooms with springwater and loves to sit on heads.

Generation VIII.Sword: Its cottony wings are full of air, making them light and fluffy to the touch. Swablu takes diligent care of its wings.
Generation VIII.Shield: Since Swablu looks like a cumulus cloud, foes can have a hard time finding it. Apparently its wings turned white over many generations.
